title: Indian-origin cab driver returns over Rs 4.5 lakhs to its owner, wins hearts - Times of India
text: Resolution for 2024 for happiness and better mental health Vaani Kapoor weaves six yards of ethnic magnificence in a multi-coloured saree Nehha Pendse's Best Looks From 2023 Places in India that are a bird watcher's paradise Kajal Aggarwal looks cute as she inspires her look from Gen Z fashion! 10 different lehenga draping styles for this wedding season Best New Year's Eve foods to celebrate 2024 Get inspired by Nusraat Faria's bridal looks Desserts under 200 calories that will satisfy your cravings From better metabolism to longevity, Ayurvedic herbs to be consumed regularly A complaint was filed at a Mumbai police station on Wednesday against Ranbir Kapoor and his family members for allegedly hurting religious sentiments over a viral video showing them celebrating Christmas. No First Information Report (FIR) has been registered in the case yet. Arbaaz Khan and Shura Khan's intimate nikah ceremony took place at Arpita Khan Sharma's residence in Mumbai where Arbaaz's close friend Raveena Tandon and her daughter Rasha Thadani were also present. She has now shared some inside pictures from Arbaaz and Shura's wedding ceremony. Actor Sajid Khan, who played the younger version of Sunil Dutt's Birju in Mehboob Khan's "Mother India" and later rose to prominence with international projects such as "Maya" and "The Singing Filipina", has died following a battle with cancer. Khan was in his early 70s.
